#importing analysis libraries  
import pandas as pd 
import numpy as np
#importing visualization libraries
%matplotlib inline 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.18afb52e:
#Mengubah nama kolom ke huruf kecil
for column in train.columns:
    column_lower = column.lower()
    train = train.rename(columns = {column:column_lower})
source.b620e430:
plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 8))
sns.heatmap(train.corr(), cmap = 'Blues', annot = True, fmt = '.2f')
source.825da9be: #Di antara feature numerik, tidak ada korelasi kuat
source.57645c0e:
bins = [18, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 120]
labels = ['18-29', '30-39', '40-49', '50-59', '60-69', '70+']
train['age_group'] = pd.cut(train.age, bins, labels = labels,include_lowest = True)

age_group = train.age_group.value_counts().to_frame()
age_group = age_group.rename(columns={'index':'age_group', 'age_group':'counts'})
age_group.reset_index()
source.89372859:
age_count_plot = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 7))

age_count_plot = sns.countplot(
    y = 'age_group',
    data = train,
    palette= 'Blues',
)

sns.despine()
age_count_plot.set_ylabel('Age groups', fontsize = 15)
age_count_plot.set_xlabel('')
age_count_plot.set_title('Age groups', fontsize = 20)
plt.show()
source.8879cc97:
age_count_plot = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 7))

age_count_plot = sns.countplot(
    x = 'age_group',
    data = train,
    hue = 'response',
    palette= 'Blues',
)

sns.despine()
age_count_plot.set_xlabel('Age groups', fontsize = 15)
plt.legend(title='', loc='upper right', labels=['No response', 'Response'])
age_count_plot.set_ylabel('')
age_count_plot.set_title('Age group and response', fontsize = 20)
plt.show()
source.3398b19b:
annual = plt.subplots(figsize=(18, 7))
annual = sns.boxplot(
    x = 'annual_premium',
    data = train,
    palette  = "Blues"
)

annual.set_xlabel('Annual premium', fontsize = 15)
annual.set_ylabel('')
annual.set_title('Annual Premium', fontsize = 20)
plt.show()
source.0c97db60:
annual_6 = plt.subplots(figsize=(14, 7))

annual_6 = train[train.annual_premium <= 60000].annual_premium.hist(color = sns.color_palette("Blues", 1))

annual_6.set_xlabel('Annual premium value', fontsize = 15)
annual_6.set_ylabel('')
annual_6.set_title('Annual Premium', fontsize = 20)
plt.show()
